questions.text: In the final show, how long was the kiss between Hot Lips and Hawkeye?
questions.explanation:
34.8 seconds

	This was the longest kiss in TV history as of 2002.

Benjamin Franklin Pierce.

	Named after both a family member and a his fathers favorite president.  His nickname of Hawkeye came from his fathers favorite book.

questions.text: Charles Winchester's middle name is what?
questions.explanation:
Emerson.

	From his mother's side of the family.

questions.text: Who played a Swedish doctor named Inga?
questions.explanation:
Mariette Hartley.

	Hawkeye was so in love with her.  It was one of the few times we saw him love someone, not just lust after her.

questions.text: Klinger's ancestors came from what country?
questions.explanation:
Lebanon.

	His family really is from there in real life as well.  The hair and nose should have been your first clue.

questions.text: What is the name of the bar outside of the camp?
questions.explanation:
Rosie's.

	Named after the owner.  If you remember correctly, there were at least two different women who played her in the series.

questions.text: What is the name of Charles's sister?
questions.explanation:
Honoria.

	She is the one with the speech problem.

questions.text: What is the name of BJ's wife?
questions.explanation:
Peg.

	Peg is very pretty with long blond hair.  Erin is his daughter and BJ often says that she looks just like her mother.

Burt Metcalfe.

	In the first few years, Burt was only an associate producer.  Later on when the show gained in popularity, he then was given the higher job.
